duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with in-house production team to conceive, plan, and execute video production.
Determine video needs, create video concepts and proposals, and present to account teams and clients.
Hiring and managing vendors needed for production and developing a video production schedule.
Supervise all aspects of pre-production and post-production, including scripting and storyboard preparation.
Maintain departmental workflow processes and standard operating procedures.
Oversee the editing session and graphic creation, manage internal account team changes and client changes.

education_certification.credential: BS or BA with a major course of study in media/video production.
Extensive experience writing scripts, concepts, and treatments.
Working knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite and Apple Final Cut Studio.
